meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessive.
meanings.sent1: Her room's clutter showed the excessivenesses of her shopping habits.
meanings.sent2: The excessivenesses of his laughter filled the entire room.
meanings.sent3: The excessivenesses of the cake frosting made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The excessivenesses of her worries weighed her down like a heavy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The excessivenesses of the decorations made the party unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The excessivenesses of sugar in the drink made it too sweet to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The excessivenesses of his demands were starting to become unreasonable.
meanings.sent3: The excessivenesses of the toppings on the pizza made it hard to pick up a slice.
meanings.sent4: The excessivenesses of his excitement was like a firework bursting in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The excessivenesses of the heat in the room made everyone uncomfortable.
